summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Boren Avenue north from Denny Way to Mercer Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 19024, creating Local Improvement District No. 1832, prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
